page.title: 12EDUCATION _ PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Ludford Church of England (Controlled) Primary School, built 1866 is along_ side busy A631 road and opposite Church.'Controlled' means the L.E.A.is responsible for Admin: & Curriculum & Foundation Governors for seeing the character of the school is secure with in the practices of the Church of England. Curriculum_Reading & Language (including hand writing & creative writing) Maths, Religious Education, Science & Nature Study, Environmental Education, Physical Education, Music, Drama, Arts & Crafts & Computor Study. (This infomation put on disc on School Acorn Computor).School produces excel_ _lent Booklet setting out aims & org_ _anisation for Parents who, with Friends of the School have an Associa_ _tion supporting the School with fund raising for School activities and Educational Trips.
